panels.description: Percentage of upstream  *gate and check* jobs that are passing vs failing vs timing out.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'True' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "branch" = 'master' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat') AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" != 'TIMED_OUT' AND "branch" = 'master' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat' ) AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" = 'TIMED_OUT' AND "branch" = 'master' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Train Branch all jobs

panels.description:
Number of failing upstream jobs in the last 24 hours.

Click on links below to go to the source zuul builds status.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND  "result" != 'RETRY' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: All upstream jobs

panels.description:
Number of failing upstream jobs in the last 24 hours.

Click on links below to go to the source zuul builds status.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("pipeline" = 'check' AND "passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND  "result" != 'RETRY' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream Check jobs

panels.description:
Number of failing upstream jobs in the last 24 hours.

Click on links below to go to the source zuul builds status.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("pipeline" = 'gate' AND "passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND  "result" != 'RETRY' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream Gate jobs

panels.description:
Number of failing upstream Periodic jobs in the last 24 hours.

Click on links below to go to the source zuul builds status.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("pipeline" =~ /periodic.*/  AND "passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND  "result" != 'RETRY' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream Periodic jobs

panels.description:
Upstream zuul *gate* queue.  The time a given patch will wait before running the upstream gate.

Click on the links below to go to the zuul build status.
panels.title: Upstream Zuul queue

panels.description:
A running list of failing upstream jobs. By default this will show the last 3 days.

Click on individual jobs to go to the logs or to the gerrit change.

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "pipeline", "change", "log_link", "duration",  "result", "sova_reason" as "Failure Cause"  FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND  "result" != 'RETRY' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream failing gate jobs

panels.description: Percentage of upstream  *gate and check* jobs that are passing vs failing vs timing out.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'True' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat') AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" != 'TIMED_OUT' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat')  AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" = 'TIMED_OUT' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat')AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream CI stats

panels.description: Percentage of upstream  *periodic* jobs that are passing vs failing vs timing out.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'True' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "pipeline"='periodic'  AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat') AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "pipeline"='periodic' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" != 'TIMED_OUT' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat') AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "pipeline"='periodic' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" = 'TIMED_OUT' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream Periodic CI stats

panels.description:
Number of failing upstream *gate* jobs in the last 24 hours.

Click on links below to go to the source zuul builds status.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("pipeline" = 'gate' AND "passed" = 'False' AND "result" = 'RETRY')  AND "project" = 'openstack/heat' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream jobs failed in RETRY

panels.description: Percentage of upstream  *gate and check* jobs that are passing vs failing vs timing out.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'True' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "branch" = 'master'  AND "pipeline" = 'check') AND "project" = 'openstack/heat' AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" != 'TIMED_OUT' AND "branch" = 'master' AND "pipeline" = 'check' ) AND "project" = 'openstack/heat' AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "result" = 'TIMED_OUT' AND "branch" = 'master'  AND "pipeline" = 'check') AND "project" = 'openstack/heat' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Master Branch, Upstream Check

panels.description: A running list of failing upstream that hit RETRY's

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "change",  "pipeline", "log_link", "duration", "result", "sova_reason" as "Failure Cause"  FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False'  AND "result" = 'RETRY' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream failing jobs in RETRY

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "log_link", "duration", "result", "result_num", "sova_reason" FROM "build" WHERE ("result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "pipeline" = 'periodic' AND "project" = 'openstack/heat') AND $timeFilter

panels.description:
Running list of all upstream jobs including *check* and *gate* queues.

Click on individual job names to go to logs or on the patch number to see the gerrit review.

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "change", "log_link", "duration", "result", "result_num", "pipeline", "voting" FROM "build" WHERE ("result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "job_name" =~ /.*molecule-.*/ OR "job_name" =~ /.tox.*/ ) AND "project" = 'openstack/heat' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream TripleO tox and molecule jobs

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'True' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "pipeline" = 'check') AND "project" = 'openstack/heat' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "pipeline" = 'check') AND "project" = 'openstack/heat' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)
SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'True' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "pipeline" = 'gate') AND "project" = 'openstack/heat' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)

SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "pipeline" = 'gate') AND "project" = 'openstack/heat' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)
